editions.name: Energy Drink
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Energy Drink is appreciated worldwide by top athletes, busy professionals, university students and travellers on long journeys

editions.name: Energy Drink Zero
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Zero serves up the same wings as Red Bull Energy Drink and Red Bull Sugarfree, but with a totally new flavour sweetened with monk fruit extract

editions.name: Energy Drink Sugarfree
editions.flavor_description: Wings without sugar: Red Bull Energy Drink without sugar

editions.name: The Winter Edition
editions.flavor_description: The Red Bull Winter Edition with the exotic taste of passionfruit, rounded off with Elderflower notes

editions.name: The Summer Edition
editions.flavor_description: The Red Bull Summer Edition: The Energy Drink with the mouthwatering new flavour that offers the taste of White Peach, hihglighted by a touch of citrus peel and floral notes

editions.name: The Red Edition
editions.flavor_description: The Red Bull Red Edition with the fresh taste of Watermelon

editions.name: The Blue Edition
editions.flavor_description: The Red Bull Blue Edition. The Energy Drink with the fruity taste of Blueberry

editions.name: The Tropical Edition
editions.flavor_description: The Tropical Edition. Experience the exotic taste of Tropical Fruits

editions.name: The Lilac Edition Sugarfree
editions.flavor_description: The Red Bull Lilac Edition Sugarfree gives you wings with the delicate flavour of Grapefruit and Blossom

editions.name: The Berry Edition Sugarfree
editions.flavor_description: The Red Bull Berry Edition Sugarfree with the taste of Forest Fruits complemented by exciting herbal notes of verbena

editions.name: The Coconut Edition Sugarfree
editions.flavor_description: The Red Bull Coconut Edition Sugarfree with the taste of exotic Coconut and fruity Blueberry
